skill.name: Fists of Thunder
skill.description:
Generate: 14 Spirit per attack

Teleport to your target and unleash a series of extremely fast punches that deal 122% weapon damage as Lightning.

Every third hit deals 183% weapon damage as Lightning split between all enemies in front of you.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 14 Spirit per attack

Teleport to your target and attack it with a series of rapid punches.

rune.name: Static Charge
rune.description: Fists of Thunder applies Static Charge to enemies hit for 6 seconds. Each time an enemy with Static Charge gets hit, there is a chance that every other enemy with Static Charge within 40 yards takes 125% weapon damage as Lightning.
rune.simpleDescription: Fists of Thunder applies Static Charge to enemies. Each time an enemy with Static Charge gets hit, there is a chance that every nearby enemy with Static Charge takes Lightning damage.

skill.name: Sweeping Wind
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex that continuously deals 30% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. The vortex lasts 6 seconds and is refreshed each time you strike an enemy with a melee attack. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to increase the vortex effect up to 3 stacks for a total of 90% weapon damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex for 6 seconds that damages nearby enemies. Critical Hits intensify the vortex.

rune.name: Cyclone
rune.description:
While your vortex is at the maximum stack count, Critical Hits have a chance to spawn a lightning tornado that periodically electrocutes nearby enemies for 23% weapon damage as Lightning. Each spawned lightning tornado lasts 3 seconds.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Lightning.
rune.simpleDescription:
While the vortex is at its maximum, Critical Hits have a chance to spawn a lightning tornado that electrocutes enemies.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Lightning.

skill.name: Mantra of Retribution
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Increase the amount of damage dealt to 202% for 3 seconds.

Passive: You and your allies within 60 yards deal 101% of your weapon damage as Holy to attackers when blocking, dodging or getting hit.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Increase the amount of damage dealt to attackers.

Passive: You and nearby allies deal a percentage of your weapon damage as Holy to attackers when blocking, dodging or getting hit.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Transgression
rune.description: Passive: Mantra of Retribution also increases attack speed by 10% for you and your allies.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Mantra of Retribution also increases attack speed for you and your allies.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Ascendance
rune.description: Charge yourself with Lightning, causing your next attack after moving 10 yards to Stun enemies for 1.5 seconds.
rune.simpleDescription: Charge yourself with Lightning, causing your next attack after moving a short distance to stun enemies.

skill.name: Cyclone Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Pull up to 16 enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 261% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Mystical force pulls nearby enemies towards you and blasts them.

rune.name: Eye of the Storm
rune.description:
Reduce the Spirit cost of Cyclone Strike to 26 Spirit.

Cyclone Strike's damage turns into Lightning.
rune.simpleDescription:
Reduce the Spirit cost of Cyclone Strike.

Cyclone Strike's damage turns into Lightning.

skill.name: Lashing Tail Kick
skill.description:
Cost: 30 Spirit

Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick that deals 624% weapon damage as Physical.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 30 Spirit

Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick that is effective against small groups of enemies.

rune.name: Scorpion Sting
rune.description:
Enemies hit have a 85% chance to be stunned for 1.5 seconds.

Lashing Tail Kick's damage turns into Lightning.
rune.simpleDescription:
Enemies hit have a chance to be stunned.

Lashing Tail Kick's damage turns into Lightning.

skill.name: Exalted Soul
skill.description:
Increase maximum Spirit by 100 and increase Spirit Regeneration by 2 per second.

Spirit fuels your defensive and offensive abilities.
skill.flavor: "Endeavor to be one with the hidden truth and you will soar beyond the sky." —Waykeeper Tzo Krin

skill.name: Fleet Footed
skill.flavor: Strength out of place is no strength at all.

skill.name: Mythic Rhythm
skill.description: Every third hit from a Spirit Generator increases the damage of your next damaging Spirit Spender by 40%.
skill.flavor: "The spirit is inconquerable, it folds in upon itself, it grows, always strengthening." — Patriarch Anisim

skill.name: One With Everything
skill.description: Your resistance to all elements is equal to your highest elemental resistance.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Poison Bolts
skill.description:
Cooldown: 3 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 320% weapon damage and an additional 100% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 3 seconds

Shoots a deadly poisoned bolt.

skill.name: Vanish
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

The Scoundrel vanishes in a cloud of smoke when injured, reappearing after 4 seconds. While vanished, he will heal himself for 206316 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

The Scoundrel temporarily vanishes when in danger.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to targets within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun targets for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stuns enemies.

skill.name: Hysteria
skill.description: Whenever you or the Scoundrel land a Critical Hit, you both will go into hysterics, increasing all damage done by 3% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause you and the Scoundrel to temporarily deal more damage.
